statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); short_cwd="${cwd/#$HOME/~}"; branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); dirty=""; if [ -n "$branch" ]; then git -C "$cwd" diff --quiet 2>/dev/null && git -C "$cwd" diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null || dirty="*"; git_info="$(printf '\033[90m')${branch}${dirty}$(printf '\033[0m') "; fi; printf "$(printf '\033[34m')%s$(printf '\033[0m') %s$(printf '\033[35m')‚ùØ$(printf '\033[0m')" "$short_cwd" "$git_info"
